metadata.title: CVE-2019-13618 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In GPAC before 0.8.0, isomedia/isom_read.c in libgpac.a has a heap-basedbuffer over-read, as demonstrated by a crash in gf_m2ts_sync inmedia_tools/mpegts.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13618` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac12 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
